"Dash Panels":
"Press the<%Access> to access the dash panels.
This will allow you to dash for a limited time."

"While dashing, every time you connect to another dash panel,
you can dash for longer periods of time.
(You can always connect to the next dash panel, so accessing it again is unnecessaryï¼‰

(Peformable actions while dashing)
Press<%Jump>to jump.
Press<%NormalAttack>/<%PhotonArts>to kick.

The attack power of your kick
can be enhanced up to a maximum of 3 stages by connecting to more dash panels.

By skillfully connecting to the next dash panels, you can quickly reach
the destination, and reach the fight immidiately."
